page.title: 13MY HOUSE
page.content: {My House } I live at 205,North Drive,Maylandsea, Essex.There are three children in my family,I have a brother called Aaron who is 19 and a sister called Sarah who is 18.I live in a detached house which has central heating.My house is a chalet type,it has got four bedrooms,three of them are upstairs. There is also a bathroom upstairs. Downstairs there is one bedroom a shower room,a study,a telephone room, a sitting room,a dining room,a breakfast room and a kitchen.We have lived there for 9 years. My garden is very big,there are four greenhouses where we grow tomatoes and cucumbers and four sheds in it. There are also lots of vegetable patches where we grow peas,potatoes and beans.
